name: psychiatrically
content:

in a way that relates to mental illness or its study: This is one of the most psychiatrically underserved areas of the country. Potential participants in the housing program are screened to determine if they are psychiatrically stable. See
psychiatric
More examplesFewer examplesShe was not psychiatrically scarred by her experience.The home acts as a halfway house for the psychiatrically ill.Research shows if housing is provided, even chronic and psychiatrically disabled homeless people will stay.
